Race.SpecificTitle: PW Tax Continuation -- .57 Mill (.07 Increase) - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), acting under the authority of La. R.S. 3:301, continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of fifty-seven hundredths of one (0.57) mill, on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $78,980 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of improving, operating, maintaining and equipping the Morehouse Parish Extension Office of the LSU Agricultural Center, including 4-H youth programs and all other educational programs, said tax to represent a seven hundredths of one mill (0.07 mill) increase over the 0.50 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on October 20, 2007, such increase having been effective beginning in 2012 due to reappraisal?
